mapper.select: SELECT s.SOLVED_ID, s.IS_SOLVED, s.SOLVED_SCORE, p.KOREAN_CONTENT, p.VIET_CONTENT, p.AUDIO_URL, p.PROBLEM_ID FROM SOLVED s JOIN PROBLEM p ON p.PROBLEM_ID = s.PROBLEM_ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND s.SOLVED_DATE = CURDATE()
SELECT VIET_CONTENT FROM PROBLEM WHERE PROBLEM_ID != #{problemId} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4

SELECT COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SOLVED s JOIN MEMBER m ON s.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND s.SOLVED_DATE = CURDATE()) * 100 FROM SOLVED s JOIN MEMBER m ON s.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND s.SOLVED_DATE = CURDATE() AND s.IS_SOLVED != "UNSOLVED";
SELECT AVG(s.SOLVED_SCORE) FROM SOLVED s JOIN MEMBER m ON s.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND s.SOLVED_DATE = CURDATE() AND s.IS_SOLVED != "UNSOLVED"
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.MEMBER_ID) FROM SOLVED s JOIN MEMBER m ON s.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND s.SOLVED_DATE = CURDATE() AND s.IS_SOLVED != "UNSOLVED"

select count(case when s.is_solved = 'SOLVED' and s.problem_type = 'LISTENING' then s.is_solved end) / count(case when s.problem_type = 'LISTENING' then s.is_solved end) * 100 AS listening, count(case when s.is_solved = 'SOLVED' and s.problem_type = 'SPEAKING' then s.is_solved end) / count(case when s.problem_type = 'SPEAKING' then s.is_solved end) * 100 as speaking, count(case when s.is_solved = 'SOLVED' then s.is_solved end) / count(*) as total from solved s left join member m on s.member_id = m.member_id where s.solved_date = curdate() and m.company_id = #{companyId};

select count(case when s.is_solved = 'SOLVED' and s.problem_type = 'LISTENING' then s.is_solved end) / count(case when s.problem_type = 'LISTENING' then s.is_solved end) * 100 AS listening, count(case when s.is_solved = 'SOLVED' and s.problem_type = 'SPEAKING' then s.is_solved end) / count(case when s.problem_type = 'SPEAKING' then s.is_solved end) * 100 as speaking, count(case when s.is_solved = 'SOLVED' then s.is_solved end) / count(*) as total from solved s left join member m on s.member_id = m.member_id where s.solved_date >= curdate() - interval 7 day and s.solved_date <= curdate() and m.company_id = #{companyId};

select count(case when s.is_solved = 'SOLVED' and s.problem_type = 'LISTENING' then s.is_solved end) / count(case when s.problem_type = 'LISTENING' then s.is_solved end) * 100 AS listening, count(case when s.is_solved = 'SOLVED' and s.problem_type = 'SPEAKING' then s.is_solved end) / count(case when s.problem_type = 'SPEAKING' then s.is_solved end) * 100 as speaking, count(case when s.is_solved = 'SOLVED' then s.is_solved end) / count(*) * 100 as total from solved s left join member m on s.member_id = m.member_id where year(s.solved_date) = year(curdate()) and month(s.solved_date) = month(curdate()) and m.company_id = #{companyId};
